A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good action but the story makes no sense what so ever...  I feel like the director has never even seen a star wars movie in his life....  Luke  becomes a failure wussy\, Leia and Rey becomes a god tier force user with no training what so ever\, and Finn doesn't grow at all as a character just stays the scared deserter he was in the first film...  Just felt like such a waist of good characters.
